projects.title: Bank System Client Classificator
projects.description: Implementing a model that classifies clients of a bank as good/bad for loaning, using data exploration and features selection methods.

projects.title: Articles Data Mining
projects.description: Collecting data, preprocessing, transforming them and applying data mining methods for clustering / classification evaluation.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency \Reco System
projects.description: A cryptocurrency recommendation system, using sentiment analysis on tweeter data, predicting with knn/ clustering and validating with 10-cross fold validation.

projects.title: Nearest Neighbors Searching
projects.description: Nearest neighbor searching implementation, in high dimensional vector spaces, using local sensitive hashing and projection to hypercube.

projects.title: Clustering Variations
projects.description: Implementing clustering algorithms, with K-means and K-medoids compinations, and evaluating it with silhouette evaluation.

projects.title: Solving problems with prolog
projects.description: Solving a set of problems with the help of prolog. Solutions are based on Constraint Satisfaction Problem definitions

projects.title: Winning Pacman with AI
projects.description: Solving the famous berkeley pacman problems with python.

projects.title: DEV STUDY
projects.description: Currently implementing and conducting a survey management platform for developers. Autogenerate surveys from json, analyze and visualize results with wizard.

projects.title: DEVils Scrum Tool
projects.description: Web cooperative platform that helps teams to implement software projects based on agile methodology (SCRUM) via sprints, epics, user stories and issues.

projects.title: NAPAO
projects.description: My submission and solution for the COVID-19 crisis to the Europeran Hackathon: EUvsVirus. Crowd management and live tracking of people in restaurants, malls, grocery stores.

projects.title: Redesinging Eudoxus
projects.description: Usability evaluating, Personas, Functional Requirments, Prototyping and complete implementation of web platform that manages universities books.

projects.title: This Web portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio showcasing my work was make with react.

projects.title: Agreektourism
projects.description: Web platform that offers farmers create agricultural experiences easily and tourists can book them for vacation.

projects.title: To Don't List
projects.description: Not your average to do list. A fun project created with nodejs.

projects.title: Trie
projects.description: An inverted index implemented as a trie, used to store words from big documents in order to query them. Used as part of Minisearch project.

projects.title: Heap File Manager
projects.description: Implementetion of a heap file manager, that creates,stores,scans and prints records in heap files, with the help of block level functions.

projects.title: External Sort
projects.description: External mergesort implementation for big files that doesn't fit into memory. Alogirithm based on Navathe's and Elmarsi's book, the Fundamentals of Database Systems.

projects.title: Skiplists
projects.description: A skiplists & chained hashing  implementation for fast accessing to university records. Storing complexity 0(n), accessing O(1) and range queries O(k).

projects.title: Game of life
projects.description: The Conway's fampus game of life problem, implemented with parallel programming. Extensive analysis about performance and metrics, on each method, is followed.

projects.title: Minisearch
projects.description: A simple google-like search engine that uses inverted index to store text documents and can answer queries based on top-k documents relevant to those queries.

projects.title: Writer-Readers
projects.description: Solving a simple single writer multiple readers problem with the help of shared memory and semaphores.

projects.title: Job-Executor
projects.description: A text processing engine that answers queries by creating multiple workers with fork, communicating through named pipes,low level I/O and signals and by analyzing log files with bash scripting

projects.title: Parsing With Java
projects.description: Implementing a hand-written recursive descent parser and generated ones with the help of   Java,  Java CUP  and  JFlex.

projects.title: Semantic Analysis For Minijava
projects.description: Semanting analysis on minijava inputs, using symbol tables and applying type checking with the help of visitor pattern.

projects.title: Generating Intermediate Code
projects.description: Using the visitor pattern to produce linear level IR for a subset of instructions of LLVM language and producing code that can be compiled with C-Lang.
